means: 站立的；直立的；说单口相声的
光明正大的，敢说敢干的，坦率正直的，不耍手段的，凭真功夫的

sentence.Network_en: She'd learnt to be herself and to stand up for her convictions.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已经学会了按自己的方式行事，坚持自己的信仰。

sentence.Network_en: There wasn't room to stand up and he had to bend double.
sentence.Network_cn: 空间太小无法站直，他不得不弓着身子。

sentence.Network_en: You need strength of mind to stand up for yourself.
sentence.Network_cn: 你需要用精神力量来支持自己。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 服装英语电子小词典(j精华版)[中华纺织网论坛] ... Polo 马球领 Standup 直立领 Milan 米兰式.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(S5) ... stand-to 待命态势 stand-up 站立的 standard atmosphere 标准大气.
牛津英语模块6单词表_百度文库 ... unit 1 Laughter 笑，笑声 stand-up 单口喜剧，单口的 humour 幽默.
小编乱弹：是不是发现美国式的“单口相声”（Standup）和中国传统相声的不同了呢？呵呵。

list.abs: 新概念英语单词表带音标（第一册） - 豆丁网 ... back 背 stand up 起立，站起来 help 帮助.
介词短语_百度百科 ... stand out 突出，显眼 stand up 站起来，耐用 step up 提高，加快，加紧.

entry.def: A stand-up comic or comedian stands alone in front of an audience and tells jokes.

example.ex: He does all kinds of accents, he can do jokes—he could be a stand-up comic...
example.tran: 他会模仿各种口音，还会讲笑话——他可以当个独角喜剧演员。

example.ex: Women do not normally break into the big time by doing stand-up comedy.
example.tran: 女性靠演单人喜剧通常无法成名。

entry.tran: 单人滑稽表演;单口相声

example.ex: ...getting by on likeability, professionalism and the kind of nerve you need to do stand-up.
example.tran: 凭借个人魅力、精湛的技艺和进行单人喜剧表演所需要的勇气过活

entry.def: If people have a stand-up argument or fight, they stand up and shout at each other or hit each other violently.

means.word_mean: 2. of a collar; standing up rather than folded down;

auth_sentence.content: They stand up, they argue and they talk.
auth_sentence.res_content: They stand up, they argue and they talk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They stand up, they argue and they talk.

auth_sentence.content: But none of these arguments stand up to scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content: But none of these arguments stand up to scrutiny.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But none of these arguments stand up to scrutiny.

auth_sentence.content: The tents can't stand up against the wind.
auth_sentence.res_content: The tents can't stand up against the wind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The tents can't stand up against the wind.
